title: Provided further that in case the cinema theater is proposed along with other permissible uses in bu
clause_text: Provided further that in case the cinema theater is proposed along with other permissible uses in building then open spaces as per requirement of special building will be considered deemed to be sufficient where waiting area for patron is provided within the building
section: (6).Open spaces for various types of buildings-
